text: Thomas Joseph "Tom" Tauke (born October 11, 1950 in Dubuque, Iowa) is an American lawyer and former politician of the Republican Party. He is a CEO of Verizon. Tauke was a member of the United States House of Representatives for Iowa from 1979 to 1991. He was also a member of the Iowa House of Representatives from 1975 to 1979. == References == Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:American chief executives Category:Lawyers from Iowa Category:Businesspeople from Iowa Category:United States representatives from Iowa Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Dubuque, Iowa
title: Tom Tauke
